div.bibl: The Philippine Messenger, Vol. II, No. 9, June 9, 1935ZAMBALENEOS TO OBSERVE PHILIPPINE COMMONWEALTH DAY

body.p: The spirited citizens of Zambales, Philippine Islands, under the leadership of Dr. Juan G. Udan, President of the Zambales Club of Chicago, will observe Philippine Commonwealth Day tonight at the Hotel La Salle. A very appropriate program for the occasion has been prepared by the organization. Dancing will follow. The Social Committee has been making all necessary arrangement to make the occasion a success.
